text.text_translated: Scientists have more questions about genetics. They want to know how they influence the brain and language. **Genes** are the instructions inside our bodies. Scientists want to know if a change in these instructions gave us the ability to speak. Researchers have found a change in these instructions that happened between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago. This change seems to be connected with speaking. It is also connected with how our brains control our mouths and face. Monkeys have a similar instruction, but it did not have this same change. It is too early to say how much influence these instructions have on language, but the answers might one day be found in our DNA.

best_attempt.text_translated: Scientists have more questions about how genetics influence the brain and language. They want to know if special **genes**, which are the instructions inside our bodies, underwent a change that gave us the ability to speak. Researchers have found a gene that changed between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago, which seems to be connected with speaking and how our brains control our mouths and face. Monkeys have a similar gene, but it did not undergo this same change. Although it is too early to say how much influence genes have on language, the answers might one day be found in our DNA.
